Name That Part!

The game for discerning bicycle mechanics and nerds alike.
Choose wisely or perish.

  • 00 parts currently in game
  • Last part added on 00/00/2024
  • 2 photos, 4 options
  • 20 seconds per part to choose
  • 1 point drop every 40 milliseconds
    (Points drop much faster than the counter shows
    This equates to 25 points every second)
  • If the points reach zero, game over
  • If you choose wrong, game over
